snippet: Several high-profile rape cases involving foreign women are keeping tourists away from India, with one trade group reporting that visits by women are down 35 percent.
abstract: Several high-profile rape cases involving foreign women are keeping tourists away from India, with one trade group reporting that visits by women are down 35 percent; troubling trend could affect foreign tourism, which makes an essential contribution to India's flagging economy.

byline.original: By NEHA THIRANI BAGRI and HEATHER TIMMONS

lead_paragraph: Several high-profile rape cases involving foreign women are keeping tourists away from India, with one trade group reporting that visits by women are down 35 percent.

headline.seo: Rape Cases Are Making Tourists Wary of Visiting India
headline.main: India Scrambles to Reassure Tourists Shaken by Recent Attacks on Women
headline.print_headline: India Scrambles to Reassure Tourists Shaken by Recent Attacks on Women
